definition: to go uphill/to spin cocoon (silkworms)/to pass away
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
to work in the fields (esp. young school-leavers)/forced agricultural experience for city intellectuals

sentences.english: The Box Hill line, causing trouble for Zhao Yingxiong.
sentences.chinese: 匣子上山一行，为赵英雄带来了麻烦。

sentences.english: My grandpa told me there was people coming for it each year.
sentences.chinese: 外公说，每年这里都会有收药材的人上山。

sentences.english: As you go up a mountain, you have to overcome the earth's gravity which pulls you down.
sentences.chinese: 上山时你必须克服把你往下拉的地球引力。

sentences.english: Nine gun eight - to bring people think Guo, Guo received two mountains.
sentences.chinese: 九枪八想到郭大双，提出带人接郭大双上山。

sentences.english: He and she dinked up the hill.
The results, along with the master went up into the mountain to uncle et al found the bandits jubilation.
sentences.chinese: 结果，王福随着舅老爷上山才发现土匪山上一片欢腾。

sentences.english: I could hardly walk after I climbed up the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 爬上山后，我几乎走不动了。

sentences.english: Then to the Bathroom Fixture District, and uphill to the Roll-Out Flooring District.
sentences.chinese: 然后到了浴室区，上山到了地板区。

sentences.english: Doris:There is snow on Yangmingshan. Let's go visit the mountain together.
sentences.chinese: 阳明山下雪了耶，我们一起上山去看好不好。

sentences.english: Shouhou after Wang Shaoqiang, also along with the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 瘦猴追上王少强，也要一起上山。

sentences.english: Many firecrackers hanging on walls in the daytime ready to send the coffin up the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 发殡那天村里很多家门口都要挂上鞭炮送老人上山。

sentences.english: Go to the mountain, and bring back more firewood.
sentences.chinese: 你上山多砍一些柴薪来。

sentences.english: To catch the dragon tiger mountain to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 擒龙要下海，打虎要上山。

sentences.english: He could not persuade everyone see and then have a mountain to escape.
sentences.chinese: 众人见劝他不住，于是便纷纷上山躲避往了。

sentences.english: A person can be carried up the mountain in a sedan chair .
sentences.chinese: 还有一种选择到达山顶的是，坐轿子被人抬上山。
